io.sphere.sdk.search.model

Class TypeSerializer<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sphere.sdk.models.Base
      • io.sphere.sdk.search.model.TypeSerializer<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - type of the data to transform.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<V,String>

    public final class TypeSerializer<V>
extends Base
implements Function<V,String>
    Serializer to transform certain types to Commercetools Platform format on search endpoint.
